entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
